p: Next, the extracts obtained by the two methods were centrifuged in a refrigerated centrifuge (Routine 380R, Hettich, Germany) at 20,000 RPM for 10 minutes at 4°C, and the resulting supernatant was filtered on qualitative filter paper (80 g). Finally, the extracts were dried at 40°C in a forced-air oven (Thermo Scientific, Massachusetts, USA) until reaching constant weight.
